Bash(python3 -c "
import sys
try:
    import fitz  # PyMuPDF
    doc = fitz.open\(''/Users/wangyu/Desktop/云平台接口文档_20241015.pdf''\)
    for page in doc:
        text = page.get_text\(\)
        if ''4.2.3'' in text or ''设备列表'' in text or ''deviceList'' in text:
            print\(f''=== Page {page.number + 1} ===''\)
            print\(text\)
            print\(\)
except ImportError:
    print\(''PyMuPDF not installed''\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
from pypdf import PdfReader
reader = PdfReader\(''/Users/wangyu/Desktop/云平台接口文档_20241015.pdf''\)
for i, page in enumerate\(reader.pages\):
    text = page.extract_text\(\) or ''''
    if ''4.2.3'' in text or ''所有设备'' in text or ''userdevicelist'' in text.lower\(\):
        print\(f''=== Page {i + 1} ===''\)
        print\(text\)
        print\(''\\n''\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
from pypdf import PdfReader
reader = PdfReader\(''/Users/wangyu/Desktop/云平台接口文档_20241015.pdf''\)
# 读取第19-22页（索引18-21）
for i in range\(18, 23\):
    if i < len\(reader.pages\):
        text = reader.pages[i].extract_text\(\) or ''''
        print\(f''=== Page {i + 1} ===''\)
        print\(text\)
        print\(''\\n''\)
")

import json, sys
data = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
for dp in data:
    if ''''生产计划数'''' in dp.get\(''''name'''', ''''''''\):
        print\(f""name: ''''{dp[''''name'''']}''''  value: ''''{dp.get\(''''value'''', ''''''''\)}''''  hex: {dp[''''name''''].encode\(''''utf-8''''\).hex\(\)}"" \)
        break
")
